description: Retrieve full markdown content and all tasks from documents containing specified task IDs. Automatically paginates large documents exceeding context window limits. Use this tool when you need to understand the broader context around specific tasks or analyze all tasks within a document.

task_ids.description: Array of task IDs to retrieve parent documents for

chunk_number.description: For paginated documents, request a specific chunk (1-indexed). Omit to retrieve first chunk.

documents.description: Array of documents containing the requested task IDs

markdown.description: Full markdown content (or paginated chunk if document exceeds context limit)

tasks_in_document.description: All tasks extracted from this document (not just requested task IDs)

pagination_metadata.description: Pagination details if document was split into chunks (null for single-chunk documents)

total_chunks.description: Total number of chunks for this document

chunk_size.description: Approximate size of each chunk in characters

overlap_size.description: Character overlap between adjacent chunks for context continuity

error_codes.description: One or more task IDs do not exist in the database

# Q3 Revenue Strategy

## Executive Summary
This document outlines our approach to increasing monthly recurring revenue by 25% through enterprise customer acquisition.

## Key Initiatives

### 1. Revenue Tracking Infrastructure
- Implement revenue tracking dashboard with real-time metrics
- Deploy automated reporting system for executive team
- Integrate with Salesforce for pipeline visibility

### 2. Pricing Optimization
- Optimize pricing strategy to increase average revenue per user (ARPU)
- Conduct competitor analysis for market positioning
- Test tiered pricing model with beta customers

## Next Steps
- Assign ownership for each initiative
- Define success metrics and KPIs
- Schedule weekly progress reviews
